original_text: when he comes on that day to be glorified in his saints, and to be marveled at among all who have believed, because our testimony to you was believed.
korean_text: 그 날에 그가 강림하사 그의 성도들에게서 영광을 받으시고 모든 믿는 자들에게서 놀랍게 여김을 얻으시리니 이는 (우리의 증거가 너희에게 믿어졌음이라)

sentences.original_text: when he comes on that day
to be glorified in his saints
and to be marveled at among all
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 이 가운데서 놀라움을 받으시려고
